content: OSFA automatically disburses aid to student accounts no sooner than 10 days before the semester start, if all disbursement requirements are met. Refer to the OSFA Disbursement Schedule for specific dates.

To prevent late charges for pending aid: complete all UAccess To Do items; view pending aid in UAccess; compare expected aid to current account balance and act accordingly: (1) If balance > pending aid, pay the difference by the Tuition Payment Deadline; OSFA can place an FPA indicator to prevent late charges. (2) If expected aid equals balance, OSFA can place an FPA indicator. (3) If expected aid exceeds balance, OSFA can place an FPA indicator. After aid disburses, refunds are issued automatically.
